channel.title: Problem Opening Client
channel.description:
hey ppl ;), my cousin and i are starting up a rsps and we arent really getting anywhere. the client is either bad, brocken or (this happens for my cousin) he gets an error "could not find the main class: EGUI. Program will terminate". Can anyone suggest a resolution or some good clients that won't have this problem or anything like that. Any help will be greatly appreciated. Thanks :D
Also if you need to ask me questions about his computer to find out why its not working ill try to respond to you with the answer :D

item.title: Problem Opening Client
item.dc:creator: @Kaex Kaex
item.description:
@Kaex wrote:

[center]Galkon’s Refactored or non-ref upto you, both nice 317 clients. :o[/center]

Read full topic
